title: NIXON Mikey 5 Panel Strapback Hat
features: Classic design: The Cotton Classic Jockey Strapback Cap features a timeless style that will never go out of fashion, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe.
Premium quality: Made from 100% cotton solids and 80% polyester, 20% cotton camo print, this cap is built to last and withstand everyday wear and tear.
Comfortable fit: With an adjustable webbing strap that can be adjusted between 54cm to 61cm, this cap offers a snug and comfortable fit for all head sizes.
Stylish details: The cap features metal eyelets and a woven logo label, adding a touch of style to this classic design.
Convenient closure: The snap buckle closure makes it easy to put on and take off the cap, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit.
description: Cotton classic jockey strapback cap. Metal eyelets. Woven logo label detail. Snap buckle closure.
